attributes.title: Sinclair Breweries Ltd
attributes.description:
Created on February 28, 2010 by leo on Sourcemap.org:

 Formed by the hotelier and restaurateur Norman Sinclair and his wife, Christine, took over Atlas Brewery in Kinlochleven and the Orkney Brewery in June 2006.
